posts.post_content:
T200 Premium for sale.  $1400

Size is about 21" x 13"

I don't know the full history behind this piece, but it looks like it was prepared for some kind of publication.  It's been altered from it's original form in the following ways that I can tell:

Has silver pen writing numbering on each player.
Has notes to an engraver on the right side.
Has a staple in the top.

Two players were cut from their original spot in the photo and moved (adhered) to a different position in the photo so they would fit in the photo. 

More scans here:  [url]http://imageevent.com/caramelcard/e902;jsessionid=0kkxa2dyv3.camel_s[/url]

Still, the piece is in pretty nice shape and presents well.  And, kind of tough to find.  ;)

Email or PM if you're interested.  (Would consider trades as well)

Thanks.  

Rob


[URL="http://imageevent.com/caramelcard/e902"][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/caramelcard/e902/websize/IMG_3549.JPG[/IMG][/URL]
Really neat piece. The premiums are so cool and rare.

Rob,
Sorry I missed you at the last club meeting. Hopefully you can make the trade night next month.

I love that premium. To those interested, i have seen it in person. The photos just don't do it justice.

Price drop to $1750.  Or, let's put together a trade.

Thanks again.

Rob

$1400 or best offer in cash and/or trade.

Thanks again.

Rob

Alright y'all.  Last price drop to $1200.

If no one wants it, I'll slowly cower away in shame.  (or consign it somewhere)

Thanks again.

Rob
